com.paymill.models
Class Payment

java.lang.Object
  com.paymill.models.Payment

public final class Payment
extends Object

The Payment object represents a payment with a credit card or via direct debit. It is used for several function calls (e.g. transactions, subscriptions, clients, ...). To be PCI compliant these information is encoded by our Paymill PSP. You only get in touch with safe data (token) and neednâ€™t to care about the security problematic of informations like credit card data.

Since:
3.0.0
Author:
Vassil Nikolov
